name: Median annual salaries of U.S. residing full-time employed doctoral scientists and engineers in 4-year educational institutions, by field of doctorate, sex, and tenure status: 2021
description: Median annual salaries of U.S. residing full-time employed doctoral scientists and engineers in 4-year educational institutions, by field of doctorate, sex, and tenure status: 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_of_study_and_sex
variableMeasured.description: Field of study and sex hierarchy

variableMeasured.name: field_of_study_and_sex_full_path
variableMeasured.description: Of Study And Sex Full Path

variableMeasured.name: field_of_study_and_sex_hierarchy_depth
variableMeasured.description: Of Study And Sex Hierarchy Depth

variableMeasured.name: field_all_full_time_employed_median_salary
variableMeasured.description: All Full Time Employed Median Salary

variableMeasured.name: field_not_tenured_on_tenure_track_median_salary
variableMeasured.description: Not Tenured On Tenure Track Median Salary

variableMeasured.name: field_not_tenured_on_tenure_track_se
variableMeasured.description: Not Tenured On Tenure Track Se

variableMeasured.name: field_not_tenured_not_on_tenure_track_median_salary
variableMeasured.description: Not Tenured Not On Tenure Track Median Salary

variableMeasured.name: field_not_tenured_not_on_tenure_track_se
variableMeasured.description: Not Tenured Not On Tenure Track Se

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Median annual salaries are for principal job and are rounded to nearest $1,000. Standard errors are rounded up to the nearest $500. Full time is based on working 35 or more hours per week. Four-year educational institutions include 4-year colleges or universities, medical schools (including university-affiliated hospitals or medical centers), and university-affiliated research institutes. Residence location is based on reported living location on 1 February 2021.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Doctorate Recipients, 2021.
